snippet: Visiting Arsenal was eliminated from the League Cup quarterfinals, losing a penalty shootout to a fourth-tier team, Bradford, in one of the biggest shocks in the competition in years.
abstract: Arsenal is eliminated from soccer's League Cup quarterfinals, losing penalty shootout to Bradford in one of the biggest shocks in the competition in years.
lead_paragraph: Visiting Arsenal was eliminated from the League Cup quarterfinals, losing a penalty shootout to a fourth-tier team, Bradford, in one of the biggest shocks in the competition in years.
